reviewText: Unless you are a die hard fan of Marilyn Manson, I would not advise purchasing this DVD. This is the poorest quality concert footage that I have ever had the displeasure of witnessing. During "The Beautiful People" portion of this DVD, viewers are subjected to watching a cartoonish light show which was completely irrelevant. Very disappointing to say the least. I am assuming that this is an unauthorized DVD because there is no way that the band would put this out for the public to see.
